about_the_game: BIT.TRIP RERUNNER + RUNNER MAKER infuses the classic BIT.TRIP RUNNER gameplay with new mechanics, art style, and RUNNER MAKER. The soundtrack follows this same reimagining - adding a modern flare to the lauded music of the original BIT.TRIP RUNNER with a few new tunes as well.
detailed_description: BIT.TRIP RERUNNER + RUNNER MAKER infuses the classic BIT.TRIP RUNNER gameplay with new mechanics, art style, and RUNNER MAKER. The soundtrack follows this same reimagining - adding a modern flare to the lauded music of the original BIT.TRIP RUNNER with a few new tunes as well.

name: BIT.TRIP RERUNNER Soundtrack
short_description: The soundtrack of BIT.TRIP RERUNNER + RUNNER MAKER is a celebration of the original BIT.TRIP RUNNER jams by Matthew Harwood - reenvisioned and remixed by Stemage!
